short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Control YouTube video playback speed beyond 2x.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adjust the playback speed of videos. With this extension, you can speed up or slow down videos effortlessly, going beyond the standard options available on platforms like YouTube, Vimeo, Dailymotion, Facebook, and many others. Whether you want to quickly skim through a lecture or slow down a complex tutorial, Video Speed Controller gives you the flexibility you need, making it an essential tool for students, professionals, and casual viewers alike.
